original_text:
“And in the very place where it was said to them, ‘You are not my people,’
    there they will be called ‘sons of the living God.’”
korean_text: 너희는 내 백성이 아니라 한 그 곳에서 그들이 살아 계신 하나님의 아들이라 일컬음을 받으리라 함과 같으니라

sentences.original_text: And in the very place where it was said to them,
there they will be called ‘sons of the living God.’”
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳에서 그들은 ‘살아 계신 하나님의 아들들’이라 불릴 것입니다.”
